name: Ayush Anti Dandruff Shampoo
description: Ayush Anti Dandruff Shampoo is formulated with 5000 years of Ayurvedic wisdom to give you soft & smooth hair. It contains Fenugreek (Methi), a wonder spice rich in medicinal properties and known to work as an excellent conditioner. Fenugreek replenishes damaged hair making it smooth and healthy and Til Tailam, a potent Ayurvedic oil known to nourish and restore hair back to its strength and shine. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
